main event: A tail was observed attached to the object as it moved. A trail was observed coming from the object, which appeared to be burning or glowing at times. The object changed colors at times to a reddish-green.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light and changed brightness at times.
The object moved in an irregular manner, appearing to stand still, suddenly speed up or slow down, and disappear and reappear.
The object was observed through the naked eye, with no additional optical aids.
The sighting occurred in the open country, not near an airfield.
The witness was not moving in a vehicle at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: A single, tail-like object that changed color from reddish-green to glowing/burning at times
